thread.section_title: CheapOair.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of CheapOair.com | www.cheapoair.com | 23 of 241
thread.title: M Fouad

author: M Fouad
title: M Fouad
text: I booked my flight two days ago and I find the same dates of my flight for the exact itinerary for a way less cheaper more than $135.00 per ticket on their website and when I try to call CSR they couldn't credit me for the difference and if I cancel my tickets I will lose about $500.00 in penalty and fees even if the booking was only 2 days ago but they will . My flight 7 months away and they still couldn't credit me. Never going to use them again. So they can take advantage of my money but I can not take advantage of the cheaper fare. Nonesense
